author: jgm
content: A beacon block is a block on the beacon (consensus) chain.

author: potuz
content: Is it only me or spam in this server has increased considerably? It's becoming much harder to follow conversations when every channel appears updated all the time. This is a feature that Discord could add: when removing messages from a banned user, restore the notification status of the channel to the previous state before those messages

author: chris2_2_2
content: discord spam bots have increased considerably. Likely catchpa is needed for this discord. Consensys has a decent system for their discord.

author: potuz
content: In <#844188570101350470> <@397389662085185547> gave a good feedback regarding automatic banning of someone repeating the same message `N` times. I think `N` can be as low as 3

author: Deleted User
content: Setting up a discord captcha bot is a matter of ~15min and should solve the bot problems. The captcha is based on text recognition: https://top.gg/bot/512333785338216465
